alert.note: Alert for Northern Harrison; Northern Jackson; Southern Harrison; Southern Jackson (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 07 at 2:18PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF NORTHEASTERN HARRISON AND WESTERN JACKSON COUNTIES THROUGH 245 PM CDT... At 217 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Latimer, or 10 miles north of St. Martin, moving south at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Gulfport, Biloxi, Ocean Springs, Moss Point, St. Martin, Gautier, D`iberville, Latimer, Gulf Hills, Vancleave, Gulf Park Estates, Hickory Hills, and Saucier. This includes the following Interstates... Interstate 10 in Mississippi between mile markers 40 and 67. Interstate 110 in Mississippi between mile markers 1 and 4. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Northern Harrison; Northern Jackson; Southern Harrison; Southern Jackson
